resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107591</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107591</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085830</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Believe it or not! Reporting on amazing animals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glauben Sie ihr oder nicht! Bericht über 
erstaunliche Tiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Croyez-l'ou pas ! Rendre compte des animaux 
étonnants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acredite-o ou não! Relatório em animais 
surpreendentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Credilo oppure no! Segnalando sugli animali 
stupefacenti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τον θεωρήστε ή όχϊ Υποβολή έκθεσης σχετικά με
τα καταπληκτικά ζώα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Créalo o no! El señalar sobre animales 
asombrosos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A visual and oral presentation of an "animal report" can engage students' interest and develop their artistic and visual literacy skills.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Sicht- und Munddarstellung eines 
"Tierreports" kann Interesse der Kursteilnehmer sich engagieren und 
ihre künstlerischen und Sichtbildungsgradfähigkeiten entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation visuelle et orale "d'un état 
animal" peut engager l'intérêt des étudiants et développer leurs 
qualifications artistiques et visuelles d'instruction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação visual e oral "de um relatório
animal" pode acoplar o interesse dos estudantes e desenvolver suas 
habilidades artísticas e visuais do literacy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione visiva ed orale "di un rapporto 
animale" può agganciare l'interesse degli allievi e sviluppare le 
loro abilità artistiche e visive di literacy.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια οπτική και προφορική παρουσίαση μιας "ζωικής 
έκθεσησ" μπορεί να δεσμεύσει το ενδιαφέρον των σπουδαστών και να 
αναπτύξει τις καλλιτεχνικές και οπτικές δεξιότητες βασικής 
εκπαίδευσής τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación visual y oral de un "informe 
animal" puede contratar el interés de los estudiantes y desarrollar 
sus habilidades artísticas y visuales de la instrucción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085830</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107591</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/believe-it-or-not-reporting-on-amazing-animals</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
